TEXT.BibTeX_citation: @misc{Wiki_szy_lumeni’ay, title = lumeni’ay, year = 2025, month = May, day = 5, note = {In Wikipedia [Sakizaya]}, url = {https://szy.wikipedia.org/wiki/lumeni’ay} }

S.FORM: (kamu nu hulam:黑色的) manamuh kaku tu lumeni'ay a zikuc. manamuh kaku tu lumeni'ay a zikuc. 我很喜歡黑色的衣服. u lumeni'ay a calaped. u lumeni'ay a calaped. 是黑色的褲子.
(kamo no holam:黑色的) manamoh kako to lomeni'ay a zikoc. manamoh kako to lomeni'ay a zikoc. 我很喜歡黑色的衣服. o lomeni'ay a calaped. o lomeni'ay a calaped. 是黑色的褲子.
